lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In light of a June 17 announcement from Crazy Eddie that Chemical Bank would no longer fund a 52 mln dlr credit facility with the company, plus further declines in the price of its stock, Entertainment Marketing and Zinn said they are "continuing to evaluate their alternatives with respect to their investment" in Crazy Eddie stock.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Entertainment Marketing also disclosed that it retained Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc as its financial advisor and investment banker.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Entertainment Marketing, a Houston-based firm involved in electronics wholesaling and televised home shopping sales, proposed an eight dlr a share merger acquisition of Crazy Eddie on May 29, and modified the proposal on June 9 to include the possible participation of Crazy Eddie management.
